title: Will we ever get new Unmasked skins for all the masked champions?
body: I'd really like to see skins of Zed and Shen unmasked. I mean I know Pulsfire Shen, but I'd like to see something along the lines of pre-betrayal Zed and Shen without their masks. Maybe like Ninja Trainee Zed and Ninja Trainee Shen, or something. Or even just Young Zed and Young Shen. Jhin would be another interesting unmask. But please, no James Charles Zed anymore.

replies.body: Jhin will never be unmasked. It defeats the entire purpose of his character to unmask him.

but there is no Jhin main that would like the idea

The skins team isn't that stupid. There's no Jhin without the mask, so they're not going to take it away. The entire point of his character is that we know nothing about him. Not his name, not his past, not his face, nothing. Everything about Jhin is a lie, an act, and that has been consistent in every skin thus far. Fuck, they went out of their way to give him a mask that works for him in PROJECT when they could've just not bothered, considering that he doesn't even have a face in that universe to hide. So, its obviously important, or we would've gotten an unmasked Jhin by now.

That still leaves his entire head/neck exposed, though.

Jhin has 2 masks; The one that covers his entire head, face, and neck, and the one that just covers his face. The way you're describing it, he wouldn't have that secondary mask below his main one, so we'd end up seeing way more than just the lower half of his face, which again, defeats the purpose of hiding his identity.

And, after thinking about it, his Blood Moon skin could have been a face reveal, seeing as how his face is covered by a shadow cast by his hood when he loses his mask. Not sure why they'd bother to hide his face there either if it isn't important.
